ISSUE.TITLE: Supplier order creation from project
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug We can't select a supplier when we want to create an order from an existing project linked to a customer. It's the same problem for an invoice or a proposal. ### Dolibarr Version 21 ### Environment PHP Any ### Environment Database Any ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior From a project linked to a customer, click on create and select supplier order. On the card, we can't select any supplier and, by default, customer is selected as a supplier, even if he's not (see video). ### Attached files https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/085b6857-a1bf-4919-9d3f-7ef82ea1c660

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: FIX a comment without after a comma create a sql error (#33752) Co-authored-by: Laurent Destailleur <eldy@destailleur.fr>
